articles.title: Nobel laureate Maria Ressa cleared by Philippine court of tax evasion - CNN
articles.description: A Philippine court on Wednesday acquitted Nobel laureate Maria Ressa of tax evasion, ending a raft of legal hearings against the veteran Filipino-American journalist that she says were politically motivated.
